alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 10:27PM CDT until April 24 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with localized higher amounts possible in the Pine Ridge of northern Sheridan County. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sheridan County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially over western and northern portions of Sheridan county. Strong winds could cause damage to snow covered trees and power lines. Visibility may be reduced to a half a mile or less with the heaviest snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
